title: Lori Loughlin and Mossimo Giannulli Split After Nearly 28 Years of Marriage
summary: The couple, who share daughters Olivia Jade and Isabella Rose, tied the knot in November 1997.

title: Setting the Standard: How Satellite Helps Make T-Mobile the Best Network in America
summary: The mobile provider's service was confirmed by independent performance testing firms to offer the most consistent 5G access, broadest coverage and fastest median download speeds.
